name: NameMyHex
0:
”Alexa, ask name my hex what is ff0000”
”Alexa, ask name my hex give me the name of ff00ff”
”Alexa, ask name my hex what can I call 00ffff”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: name my hex
des: Ever been in the situation where you have the perfect color scheme and hex for your design, but can't verbally express the color by a name? Instead of sifting through a web search, save time by simply asking Alexa for it with the new Name my Hex skill!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
